# maxCount

**Instance Property**

The maximum number of managed objects the relationship can reference.

## Declaration

```swift
var maxCount: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you declare a relationship attribute as optional when defining your entities, the framework only enforces [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSRelationshipDescription/minCount] and [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSRelationshipDescription/maxCount] when that attribute is not `nil`.

The default value is `0`.

## Configuring Cardinality

- **isToMany**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the relationship can contain many managed objects.
- **minCount**: The minimum number of managed objects the relationship can reference.
